synopsis.text: You Keika descends from a long line of renowned exorcists, but tragedy strikes when he loses both parents and is left impoverished. To survive, he works odd jobs telling fortunes on the streets and doing computer repairs. One fateful night in a junkyard, he witnesses the charismatic exorcist Tanmoku Ki battling an evil spirit. Spellbound, You Keika realizes this is his destiny, but his hopes are dashed when he's abruptly hit by a car and killed. As a lingering ghost, You Keika is paid a visit by Tanmoku Ki with an extraordinary proposition - join together in an exorcist partnership to keep fighting evil spirits. Despite the bizarre circumstances of their meeting, Tanmoku Ki and You Keika form a fated bond and steadfast friendship on their crusade against supernatural forces. Propelled beyond the mortal coil, You Keika finally embraces his birthright and joins the ranks of exorcists - now able to realize his full potential with the mystifying Tanmoku Ki as his ally.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
